vote.title: Authorize the (1) ratification of $304,150.00 to pay outstanding invoices due to Vishwanath Hotels, LLC for temporary hotel sheltering and services related to COVID-1; and (2) execution of a contract with Vishwanath Hotels, LLC for ongoing services in an amount up to $175,350.00 - Total not to exceed $479,500.00 - Financing: U.S. Department of Treasury - Coronavirus Relief Funds
vote.description: Authorize the (1) ratification of $304,150.00 to pay outstanding invoices due to Vishwanath Hotels, LLC for temporary hotel sheltering and services related to COVID-1; and (2) execution of a contract with Vishwanath Hotels, LLC for ongoing services in an amount up to $175,350.00 - Total not to exceed $479,500.00 - Financing: U.S. Department of Treasury - Coronavirus Relief Funds
